text: Good prices, low key atmosphere.  <Homemade chips> are very addicting!  Try the <Jordan burger>, it's absolutely my fav.  Great for lunch.  Overall the best bar food in Madison.  Can be really crowded for games and the parking is mostly street.  Also great Friday fish fry.
